patterns_discovered.description: Conditional HTML dir attribute setting based on language code
patterns_discovered.implementation: Using document.documentElement.setAttribute() with isRTL flag for Hebrew ('he')
patterns_discovered.benefit: Enables proper text direction and layout for RTL languages

patterns_discovered.description: Reactive updates to page direction when user changes language
patterns_discovered.benefit: Ensures UI immediately reflects language-specific requirements without page reload

patterns_discovered.description: Setting initial state before attaching change listeners
patterns_discovered.implementation: setHtmlDir(i18n.language) called before event listener attachment
patterns_discovered.benefit: Ensures correct state on app startup regardless of default language

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: RTL requires more than just translation files
gotchas_discovered.impact: Hebrew text without dir='rtl' attribute renders in LTR layout, causing misalignment and readability issues
gotchas_discovered.lesson: Internationalization must account for directional properties beyond text content

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: Language switching must update visual layout dynamically
gotchas_discovered.impact: Static HTML dir attribute set at build time cannot adapt to runtime language changes
gotchas_discovered.lesson: Use event listeners for language change detection rather than static configuration

gotchas_discovered.impact: If setHtmlDir() is called after event listeners are attached, initial load may have wrong direction before first change event
gotchas_discovered.lesson: Always initialize state before attaching listeners to avoid race conditions
